mapper.select: select pk_id as id, gmt_create as createTime, gmt_modified as modifiedTime, user_id as userId, question_id as questionId from user_watch_question where user_id=#{userId} and question_id = #{questionId}

select pk_id as id, gmt_create as createTime, gmt_modified as modifiedTime, title, content, is_anonymous as isAnonymous, user_id as userId,answerCount from question left outer join ((select question_id as pk_id, count(*) as answerCount from answer group by question_id) as A) using(pk_id) where pk_id in(select question_id from user_watch_question where user_id = #{userId})
